docs.snippet: BANGKOK -- Don't be fooled by the skyscrapers, the roads clogged with the latest luxury cars or the high-tech gadgetry in pockets and purses. This country of 65 million people has embraced modernity, yes, but many Thais will tell you that ghosts a...
docs.abstract: Belief in the supernatural is still widespread in Thailand despite the country's rapid modernization and some entrepreneurs are harnessing the forces of technology to reinforce it; photos (M)

headline.main: When the Spirits Talk, As They Frequently Do, Thais Are Eager to Listen
